title: QuakerBull
author: QuakerBull
content: Hello folks, I'm kinda new here, and it's not hard to tell  I'm looking to buy Satori's Bitflyer Chips to complete a set. So if you are willing to sell yours please pm me. I'm interested in White, Red, Yellow, Green, Blue, and Black. Also, for Miss Bitcoin Japan.https://imgur.com/a/SFFG4mdThank you

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Yea having the full set would be epic!

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.created_time: October 06, 2022, 12:49:37 AMLast edit: October 06, 2022, 01:58:24 AM by ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Going to be next to impossible to land a full set. Here’s the first auction for one of them on this forum https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5415704.0I was lucky enough to get 3 of them. I’ve tried very hard to get a miss btc Japan, Zaif exchange, omise go, as well as some of the one off customs (which you can see in my pic below)but just haven’t been able to find anyone willing to sell them.

comments.author: QuakerBull
comments.created_time: October 06, 2022, 10:05:09 AMLast edit: October 06, 2022, 10:29:10 AM by QuakerBull
comments.body: Thanks for the info ChiBitCTy!! I'll keep bumping here until people will lose grip on their satoris I also started to learn Chinese & Japanese to be able to search their websites/auctions   I'll keep updating this thread for any progressions in my quest

comments.author: krogoth
comments.body: It kinda makes me wanna dig and find mine somewhere in God only knows what box it might be. But yeah you will need to look thru the highway and byways of the Bitcoin field to get these....it will be an adventurous journey for sure but will be well worth it if you manage to get em all

comments.author: QuakerBull
comments.body: Quote from: krogoth on October 06, 2022, 01:53:14 PM It kinda makes me wanna dig and find mine somewhere in God only knows what box it might be. But yeah you will need to look thru the highway and byways of the Bitcoin field to get these....it will be an adventurous journey for sure but will be well worth it if you manage to get em all Dude, I so wanna come to you for a visit  it sounds like a huge adventure to dig in your boxes  let me know if you found something or just ping me ill take a plane! cheers!
